g.text: 1. Inductance Value (L): Determine required inductance for circuit function
2. Operating Frequency: Choose core material appropriate for frequency range
3. Current Rating: Ensure core doesn't saturate at maximum current
4. DC Resistance (DCR): Minimize power losses in high-current applications
5. Physical Size: Consider space constraints and mounting requirements
Proper inductor selection is critical for optimal circuit performance and efficiency
Essential for: Energy Storage | Filtering | Impedance Matching | EMI Suppression | Power Conversion
